In China you cannot access google, facebook, wikipedia, twitter, youtube, medium, aka the most used sites in western countries.

> [jlxip](#comment_33_195Xafx3aZsxtngKo7D3XWgByQ5rYJX1C): But I guess you have mirrors, right?Otherwise, can you use TOR?I mean, you are here, in ZeroNet.

No mirrors at all. I think you just don't believe that China could ban them all. But it is true. And things are still going on. China banned tons of VPNs in recent days, which was used by people who want to access those website. 
Because Zeronet is decentralized web, China can't ban it because it don't rely on any server. Except the zeronet downloading page, zeronet.io, which is banned also recently.
